comment._content: Auriol Lee (1880-1941), English-born stage actress, also worked in a few films: www.imdb.com/name/nm0496843/

comment.author: 35535881@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02]

Hi Auriol Lee I have recently discovered is related to me.   She would have been a G.G. Aunt.
Her niece was the actress Virginia Field B.1917 D. 2003.  Would you have any info on other family members .   I believe Virginia Field had a daughter in B.1943 and still living.   If you could further my searches I would be graeful
